en.purger:
**Purger**
Module that allows the bot to mass delete messages, supports mention purging as well.
en.roles:
**Roles**
Module that allows you to create and manage custom roles that anyone in the guild can add to themselves, these roles come with no extra permissions and are added by simply doing %p%*rolename*
en.colors:
**Colors**
This module creates a bunch of colors that can be added by any user in the guild by doing %p%*color*. The colors have no special permissions but they will not override automatically and you will need to mess with the role heirarchy to get it to be exactly how you would like it.
en.extras:
**Extras**
Contains a bunch of random stuff that was thrown in mostly for fun, dice, rock paper scissors, it's pretty much where all the fun commands are.
en.commands:
**Commands**
Allows moderator role and above to create custom commands and responses for the bot. This will allow, any user to use said commands after creation
en.warn:
**Warn**
The warning module, warn people, pardon people and check the warnings of people on your server as well as customize punishments for a certain warning count.
en.mute:
**Mute**
Module that enables muting of users on the server, mutes are done by overriding channel permissions or by role (if you !switchm, supports timed mutes.
en.kick:
**Kick**
Module that enables kicking of users, optionally you can include a reason.
en.ban:
**Ban**
Module that enables banning of users, a reason is not required but preferred.
en.welcome:
**Welcome**
The bot will welcome users with either a text or embed welcome message. This also supports customizeable messages with user mentions and guild names. Leave message can also be disabled if you wish.
en.verify:
**Verify**
Assign a role to the bot that, upon doing a basic command, will be assigned to the user. Usually used to make people read rules before accessing the rest of the server.

sp.purger: Módulo que permite al bot borrar mensajes masivamente, también admite borrar menciones.
sp.roles: Módolo que te permite crear y gestionar roles personalizados que todo el mundo en el servidor puede añadirse a ellos mismos, estos roles vienen sin ningún permiso extra y pueden ser añadidos simplemente escribiendo %p%*nombrederol*.
sp.colors: Este módulo crea un montón de colores que pueden ser añadidos por cualquier usuario del servidor escribiendo %p%color*. Los colores no tienen ningún permiso especial pero no se sobreescribirán automáticamente y necesitarás liarte con la jerarquía de los roles para que sean exactamente como te gustarían.
sp.extras: Contiene un montón de cosas aleatorias que fueron añadidas principalmente por diversión, dado, piedra papel y tijera, es básicamente donde están todods los comandos divertidos.
sp.commands: Permite al rol moderador y superiores crear comandos personalizados y respuestas para el bot. Esto permitirá a cualquier usuario usar dichos comandos tras su creación.
sp.warn: El módulo de advertencia, avisa a personas, perdona a personas y comprueba los avisos de las personas de tu servidor además de poder personalizar mensajes de castigo para una cantidad determinada de avisos.
sp.mute: Módulo que permite el silenciamiento de usuarios, los silencios se dan a cabo mediante una sobreescritura de los permisos del canal o por rol (si escribes !switchm, permite silencios temporales).
sp.kick: Módulo que permite la expulsión de usuarios, opcionalmente puedes incluir una razón.
sp.ban: Módulo que permite el bloqueo de usuarios, no es necesaria una razón pero sí recomendable.
sp.welcome: El bot dará la bienvenida a usuarios con un texto o con un mensaje de bienvenida insertado. Esto también permite mensajes personalizables con menciones de usuarios y nombres de servidor. El mensaje de despedida puede ser desactivado si lo deseas.
sp.verify: Asigna un bot al rol que, al realizar un comando básico, será asignado al usuario. Es usado normalmente para hacer que las personas lean las normas antes de acceder al resto del servidor.

en.purge: Deletes a specified amount of messages, mention a user to delete only that user's messages.
en.bug: Report a bug directly to the developer. Be as descriptive as possible for the best results.
en.queuelist: Get a list of features currently on queue.
en.idea: Submit an idea for gaius, format is idea | description. Be descriptive or your idea will be trashed.
en.say: Make the bot say something in chat.
en.leave: Provided a guild id, the bot will leave that guild.
en.addrole: Add custom role to be added by the bot. By default these roles have no permissions.
en.delrole: Removes custom role from the bot.
en.setdesc: Sets description of a custom role.
en.roleopt: Edits the different options bound to a specific role.
en.reset: Resets a role with the reset option, removing it from all users.
en.clear: Clears the colors from you, used to regain a white name or default role color.
en.getid: Gets discord ID of mentioned player
en.coin: Tosses a coin, heads or tails.
en.define: Define a word using Merriam-Webster dictionary.
en.giphy: Search up a funny gif using giphy.
en.blackjack:
Start a game of Blackjack, default maximum of 5 players.
Server Admin: It is HIGHLY reccommended that you do %p%cardSettings before allowing people to use this command.
en.learn: Teaches the bot a new custom command.
en.unlearn: Removes a custom command from the bot.
en.cmds: Gets current custom commands in a DM.
en.warn: Warn a user for whatever reason.
en.pardon: Pardon a user, using the ID of the warning.
en.warnlist: Gets a list of warnings on a user.
en.pwarnings: Changes the punishments to be applied when a warning count is reached.
en.mute: Mutes a person. Format %p%mute @user time (*optional*) reason
en.switchm: Switches between role and overwrite based mutes
en.tempban: Temporarily bans a user for a set amount of time in days.
en.level: Gets your current local guild level and global level.
en.stats: Gets general stats about the bot.
en.badpicmc: Reports a picture as inappropriately rated to moderate content.
en.badpicse: Reports a picture as inappropriately rated to Sight engine.
en.cmdperm: Gets a list of restrictions about a command
en.allow: Allows a command in a channel.
en.block: Blocks a command in a channel.
en.free: Frees a command from any restrictions in a channel.
en.setchannel: Sets the channel for welcome and leave messages.
en.setdelete: Sets the auto delete timout of the welcome message.
en.settype: Sets the type of welcome, text, embed or DM
en.module: Enables or disables modules on the bot.
en.guess: Play guess a number with the bot.
en.botlist: Get a list of bots that are currently in the guild.
en.weather: Get the weather for a specific location.
en.admin: Add or remove an admin role.
en.adminroles: Gets list of current admin roles.
en.autodel: Switch the bot between auto deleting commands and not.
en.helper: Add or remove a helper role.
en.helperroles: Get a list of helper roles.
en.mod: Add or remove a moderator role.
en.modroles: Gets list of current mod roles.
en.merge: Merge a currated list with your local banned words list.
en.unmerge: Remove any words in your local banned list that match the given currated list.
en.wipe: A full data (or just settings) of the bot's settings for your server.
en.bypass: Add or remove a role to bypass the filters.
en.bypassroles: Gets list roles that can bypass filters.
en.passport: Gives a 'passport' to the indicated person, allowing them to bypass the globalban for your server.
en.prefix: Change the recognized prefix of the bot.
en.filter: The base filter command for ignoring, recognizing, viewing and setting filters.
en.blacklist: Removes a server invite link from the whitelist.
en.allbans: Gets a list of all bans with username and ID in an Embed.
en.global: Globaly bans or unbans a user.
en.flag: Flags a user so staff are notified when they join a server.
en.globaladmin: Adds or removes a global admin
en.toggle: Toggles logging for a chat, as well the types of logging done, logs to the chat you do the command in.
en.changelog: yeah this is for me only.
en.slowmode: Slow mode, specify how long between messages or leave it blank for default 3 seconds add channel for channel specific slowmode eg. !slowmode channel 3.
en.panic: Panic mode restricts all newcomers rights to send messages and view channels.
en.guildinfo: Gets info about the current guild you're in.
en.get: Gets all available data about a user.
en.user: Gets all available data about a user in the guild.
en.guilds: Gets a list of guilds by name (id).
en.killguild: Notifies the bot to auto leave a guild. Only takes guild ids.
en.purgewarn: Purges the warning, as if it never existed.
en.softban: 'Kicks' a person but actually bans then unbans to remove a days worth of messages.
en.verify: Setup for role verification, do %p%verify ? for the usage command.
en.auto: Configuration command for the auto moderation.
en.checkintegrity: Checks the local bot permissions for any conflicts with modules.
en.lang: Changes the recognized language of the bot, warning other languagees may not have full translations.
en.roletally: Gets a list of roles and the amount of members that have that role.
en.filtwarn: Sets whether or not users should be notified why their message was deleted by the filters.

sp.purge: Elimina una cantidad especificada de mensajes, menciona a un usuario para borrar solo los mensajes de ese usuario.
sp.help: Consigue una lista de todos los comandos disponibles.
sp.inviteme: Consigue el enlace de invitación del bot.
sp.bug: Reporta un bug directamente al desarrollador. Sé lo más descriptivo posible para recibir los mejores resultados.
sp.queuelist: Consigue una lista de las características actuales en cola.
sp.idea: Envía una idea para gaius, el formato es idea | descripción. Sé descriptivo o tu idea será tirada a la basura.
sp.say: Haz que el bot diga algo en el chat.
sp.leave: Dada una id del servidor, el bot abandonará ese servidor.
sp.addrole: Añade un rol personalizado que sea añadido por el bot. Por defecto estos roles no tienen permisos.
sp.delrole: Elmina un rol personalizado del bot.
sp.setdesc: Establece una descripción de un rol personalizado.
sp.roleopt: Edita las diferentes opciones vinculadas a un rol específico.
sp.clear: Te quita todos los colores actuales, usado para recuperar el color blanco o el color del rol por defecto.
sp.getid: Consigue el ID de Discord de la persona mencionada.
sp.coin: Tira una moneda, cara o cruz.
sp.giphy: Busca un gif gracioso usando Giphy.

en.addrole:
**Command:** %p%addrole
**Description:** Registers a role as a custom role the bot can handle. This can be a pre-existing role or the bot can create it for you. Created roles come with no permissions.
**Usage:** %p%addrole [name]
**Example:** !addrole botfans
en.admin:
**Command:** %p%admin
**Description:** Add or remove an admin role from the bot's admins.
**Usage:** %p%admin [*add* **or** *rem*] [role name]
**Example:** !admin rem notadmin
en.adminroles:
**Command:** %p%adminroles
**Description:** Gets the list of admin roles currently registered on the server.
**Usage:** %p%adminroles 
**Example:** !adminroles
en.alias:
**Command:** %p%alias
**Description:** Assign a word as a new trigger for a specific command, takes multiple inputs separated by commas.
**Usage:** %p%alias [*command*] [*aliases, in, commas*] 
**Example:** !alias cat neko, notpupper, kitty
en.allbans:
**Command:** %p%allbans
**Description:** Gets a list of all the bans registered to the server with user ids, useful for easily gettings user ids or quickly checking for a banned user or spelling.
**Usage:** %p%allbans 
**Example:** !allbans
en.allow:
**Command:** %p%allow
**Description:** Allow usage of a command or module by specific members, roles or in a specific channel, all others will be ignored. Supply what type of ignore by adding guild, role and rolename, member mention, or a channel mention.
**Usage:** %p%allow [*command name* / *module name*] [*flag*]
**Example:** !allow dog role nodoggos4u
en.authorize:
**Command:** %p%authorize
**Description:** Authorize a server for use with Gaius+.
**Usage:** %p%authorize *server ID* 
**Example:** !authorize 270438133584232449
en.auto:
**Command:** %p%auto
**Description:** Customize the auto moderation function and restrictions, set any of these values to -1 to turn them off (notify and name dont need values). 
**newline**: Amount of lines allowed per message
**mention**: Amount of mentions per message, includes same mentions and unique mentions
**duptime**: Time between messages to wait for duplicates.
**cooldown**: Amount of time between auto mod triggers before de-escalating the punishments
**mutetime**: Amount of time the auto mute should last
**notify**: Should users be notified when they trigger automod?
**time**: Amount of time to check for spammed messages
**name**: Automatic name censor on member join and when someone changes their name.
**limit**: Amount of messages to check for
**mute, kick, ban**: On which triggers should I do which punishments.
**Usage:** %p%auto *type*
**Example:** !auto mention -1
en.autodel:
**Command:** %p%autodel
**Description:** Switches the settings for auto deleting commands.
**Usage:** %p%autodel
**Example:** !autodel
en.badpicmc:
**Command:** %p%badpicmc
**Description:** Reports a picture as incorrectly rated to Moderate Content.
**Usage:** %p%badpicmc [url]
**Example:** !badpicmc https://d3tagfjj1pibwj.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/FreejamLogo.png
en.badpicse:
**Command:** %p%badpicse
**Description:** Reports a picture as incorrectly rated to Sight Engine.
**Usage:** %p%badpicse [new rating] [url]
**Example:** !badpicse raw https://d3tagfjj1pibwj.cloudfront.net/wp-content/uploads/FreejamLogo.png
en.ban:
**Command:** %p%ban
**Description:** Bans a person from a guild, deletes the previous 24 hours of messages.
**Usage:** %p%ban [mention] [*optional* reason]
**Example:** !ban @trollperson for spamming
en.banword:
**Command:** %p%banword
**Description:** Bans a word from chat, adding it to the local filter.
**Usage:** %p%banword [text]
**Example:** !banword yourmom
en.bird:
**Command:** %p%bird
**Description:** Sends a random picture of a bird, comes with a cooldown to prevent spam.
**Usage:** %p%bird
**Example:** !bird
en.blacklist:
**Command:** %p%blacklist
**Description:** Removes an invite or url from the filter whitelist
**Usage:** %p%blacklist [invite **or** url]
**Example:** !blacklist http://discord.gg/yourserverlol
en.block:
**Command:** %p%block
**Description:** Block usage of a command or module by specific members, roles or in a specific channel. Supply what type of ignore by adding guild, role and rolename, member mention, or a channel mention.
**Usage:** %p%block [*command name* / *module name*] [*flag*]
**Example:** !block extras @membermention
en.bug:
**Command:** %p%bug
**Description:** Report a bug directly to the developer, be descriptive or else it'll be ignored.
**Usage:** %p%bug [description]
**Example:** !bug Stuff broken yo...
en.bypass:
**Command:** %p%bypass
**Description:** Add or remove a role that can bypass filters
**Usage:** %p%bypass [*add* **or** *rem*] [role name]
**Example:** !bypass add raider
en.bypassroles:
**Command:** %p%bypassroles
**Description:** Gets a list of currently registered bypass roles that will be ignored when doing moderation.
**Usage:** %p%bypassroles 
**Example:** !bypassroles
en.cat:
**Command:** %p%cat
**Description:** Sends a random picture of a cat, comes with a cooldown to prevent spam.
**Usage:** %p%cat
**Example:** !cat
en.calc:
**Command:** %p%calc
**Description:** A basic calculator that will output whatever you put into it. Currently takes: + - * / cos tan sin.
**Usage:** %p%calc [arithmetic equation] 
**Example:** !calc 34.63 + 63 / 92 * 5.15
en.censor:
**Command:** %p%censor
**Description:** Changes the censor the bot uses for image filtering.
**Usage:** %p%censor [*a*, *t*, **or** *e*]
**Example:** !censor T
NOTE: This bot uses a third party service to moderate images.
Moderate Content: https://www.moderatecontent.com/ 
This promotion is provided free of charge without compensation, I merely appreciate their API.
en.checkintegrity:
**Command:** %p%checkintegrity
**Description:** A simple command that checks to see if the bot has perms to do the modules you have enabled, warning, it will turn off those it cannot use.
**Usage:** %p%checkintegrity 
**Example:** !checkintegrity
en.cmdperm:
**Command:** %p%cmdperm
**Description:** View command restrictions for a command, takes command or module.
**Usage:** %p%cmdperm [*command name* / *module name*]
**Example:** !cmdperm colorsupport
en.deauthorize:
**Command:** %p%deauthorize
**Description:** Deauthorize a server from Gaius+.
**Usage:** %p%deauthorize *server ID* 
**Example:** !deauthorize 375856220835151883
en.define:
**Command:** %p%define
**Description:** Define a word using Merriam-Webster dictionary.
**Usage:** %p%define [*word* **or** *word of the day*]
**Example:** !define gaius
en.delrole:
**Command:** %p%delrole
**Description:** Deletes a custom role handled by the bot, any user who has this role will have it removed.
**Usage:** %p%delrole [name]
**Example:** !delrole pizza
en.dice:
**Command:** %p%dice
**Description:** Get the bot to roll dice for you, supports mutli dice and mutliple sides.
**Usage:** %p%dice [*for multi dice* #d **or** #] [**if #d** # sides]
**Example:** !dice 3d 20
en.dfine:
**Command:** %p%dfine
**Description:** Define a word using Urban dictionary.
**Usage:** %p%define [*word*]
**Example:** !define cleetus
en.dog:
**Command:** %p%dog
**Description:** Sends a random picture of a dog, comes with a cooldown to prevent spam.
**Usage:** %p%dog
**Example:** !dog
en.editlist:
**Command:** %p%editlist
**Description:** Edit a global filter with a given word
**Usage:** %p%editlist [list name] [text]
**Example:** !editlist english Tommyfoxy2
en.filter:
**Command:** %p%filter
**Description:** Allows the ignoring, recognizing, viewing, and setting of filters in chat.
**Usage:** %p%filter [**Optional**:*ignore*, *recog*, *view*] [filter name]
**Example:** !filter view alien
Swears: Commonly used swear words, their variations, and acronyms.
Inappropriate: Common light inappropriate words.
Offensive: Highly offensive words dealing with race religion and sexual orientation.
Recommended: A list of words that are widely considered bad and violate community guidelines, excludes many light swear words.
URL: Blocks all urls
Invite: Blocks all discord invites
en.flag:
**Command:** %p%flag
**Description:** Flag a user for any reason.
**Usage:** %p%flag [user] [reason]
**Example:** !flag owner cause
en.free:
**Command:** %p%free
**Description:** Clean a command of usage restrictions, takes command or module name and the same format as allow and block.
**Usage:** %p%free [*command name* / *module name*] [*flag* **or** mention]
**Example:** !free purge role notadmins
en.get:
**Command:** %p%get
**Description:** Gets information about a user not in the guild.
**Usage:** %p%get [id]
**Example:** !get 104425482757357568
en.getideas:
**Command:** %p%getideas
**Description:** Setup server side ideas, provide a channel mention.
**Usage:** %p%getideas *channel mention* 
**Example:** !getideas #ideaschannel
en.getid:
**Command:** %p%getid
**Description:** Gets the ID of a mentioned user.
**Usage:** %p%getid [mention]
**Example:** !getid @userthatyouwanttoget
en.giphy:
**Command:** %p%giphy
**Description:** Searches giphy for a picture.
**Usage:** %p%giphy [search text]
**Example:** !giphy kitties!
en.global:
**Command:** %p%global
**Description:** Global ban or global unban a user.
**Usage:** %p%global [*ban* **or** *unban*] [userid] [*if ban* reason]
**Example:** !global ban 123456789101112131415
en.globaladmin:
**Command:** %p%globaladmin
**Description:** Add or remove a global admin.
**Usage:** %p%globaladmin [*add* **or** *rem*] [user]
**Example:** !globaladmin add Duvrazh
en.guess:
**Command:** %p%guess
**Description:** Play a guessing game with the bot, provide a number to guess between or leave blank for 1-10, you get 3 tries.
**Usage:** %p%guess [*optional* number] 
**Example:** !guess 42
en.guilds:
**Command:** %p%guilds
**Description:** Gets a list of every guild the bot is connected to.
**Usage:** %p%guilds
**Example:** !guilds
en.helper:
**Command:** %p%helper
**Description:** Add or remove a helper role from the bot's helpers.
**Usage:** %p%helper [*add* **or** *rem*] [role name] 
**Example:** !helper rem fakehelper
en.helperroles:
**Command:** %p%helperroles
**Description:** Get a list of registered helper roles.
**Usage:** %p%helperroles
**Example:** !helperroles
en.idea:
**Command:** %p%idea
**Description:** Submit an idea to be implemented, be descriptive or I may trash it.
**Usage:** %p%idea [name] % [description]
**Example:** !idea troll killer % kills trolls immediately.
en.kick:
**Command:** %p%kick
**Description:** Kicks a person from the server.
**Usage:** %p%kick [mention] [*optional* reason]
**Example:** !kick @totallynottommy eating all the pizza
en.killguild:
**Command:** %p%killguild
**Description:** Adds a guild to the blacklist for auto leave.
**Usage:** %p%killguild [userid]
**Example:** !killguild 1823776283491
en.lang:
**Command:** %p%lang
**Description:** Change the language of the bot. Supported languages: 'en'(english),'fr'(french),'sp'(spanish), 'gr'(german)
**Usage:** %p%lang [userid]
**Example:** !language gr
en.merge:
**Command:** %p%merge
**Description:** Merge a curated list with your local banned words list.
**Usage:** %p%merge [filter name] 
**Example:** !merge recommended
en.mod:
**Command:** %p%mod
**Description:** Add or remove a mod role from the bots mods
**Usage:** %p%mod [*add* **or** *rem*] [role name]
**Example:** !mod add totesmod
en.modroles:
**Command:** %p%modroles
**Description:** Gets a list of registered mod roles.
**Usage:** %p%modroles 
**Example:** !modroles
en.module:
**Command:** %p%module
**Description:** Enable or disable a module, or get more information on it. Optionally you can provide 'all' to turn on all modules; all does not turn them off.
**Usage:** %p%module [*optional* help] [module]
**Example:** !module purger.
Possible modules:
en.mute:
**Command:** %p%mute
**Description:** Mutes a person indefinitely or for a period of time.
**Usage:** %p%mute [mention] [*optional* time] [*optional* reason]
**Example:** !mute @Botcreator for making a cool bot
en.nick:
**Command:** %p%nick
**Description:** Change the nickname of someone through the bot.
**Usage:** %p%nick [*member*] [*new name*]
**Example:** !nick Owner Fart face
en.panic:
**Command:** %p%panic
**Description:** Enables or disables panic mode. This will cause all users who join to be assigned a permanently muted role. Say again to disable, will delete the role from every user and saves the role for future use.
**Usage:** %p%panic 
**Example:** !panic
en.pardon:
**Command:** %p%pardon
**Description:** Pardons a specific warning ID or a user.
**Usage:** %p%pardon [warning ID **or** mention]
**Example:** !pardon 115
en.passport:
**Command:** %p%passport
**Description:** Add a user ID to be able to bypass the global ban system.
**Usage:** %p%passport [user id]
**Example:** !passport 115935666924
en.phigh:
**Command:** %p%phigh
**Description:** Add or remove a guild from the 'high priority' list.
**Usage:** %p%phigh [*add* **or** *rem*] [guild name **or** guild id]
**Example:** !phigh add Aegis
en.prefix:
**Command:** %p%prefix
**Description:** Changes the identified prefix of the bot, may be anything, reccommended you keep it short.
**Usage:** %p%prefix [text]
**Example:** !prefix nota!
en.purge:
**Command:** %p%purge
**Description:** Purge a number of messages, optional mention for a specific person only.
**Usage:** %p%purge [amount] [*optional*mention]
**Example:** !purge 10 @Gaius
en.purgewarn:
**Command:** %p%purgewarn
**Description:** Completely deletes a warning from a user, unlike pardon it removes the warning permanently.
**Usage:** %p%purgewarn [warning Id **or** mention]
**Example:** !purgewarn 935
en.pwarnings:
**Command:** %p%pwarnings
**Description:** Sets a punishment to be enacted once a user reaches a certain warning amount, takes 'ban', 'kick', and 'mute' as punishment types, or 'list', or 'time' as additional flags. 'List' lists out current settings, mult defines the mute time.
**Usage:** %p%pwarnings [number] [punishment]
**Example:** !pwarnings 4 ban
en.quote:
**Command:** %p%quote
**Description:** Get a random quote from the bot's storage.
**Usage:** %p%quote 
**Example:** !quote
en.quoteme:
**Command:** %p%quoteme
**Description:** Submit a quote to the bot for approval, upon approval you will be credited with submission.
**Usage:** %p%quoteme [quote] % [quote's author] 
**Example:** !quoteme Making stuff is hard, alcohol doesn't make it easier, but it definitely makes it more fun. % Holo | Buckshot
en.reset:
**Command:** %p%reset
**Description:** Resets the given role if the given role has the 'reset' option enabled.
**Usage:** %p%reset [role name] 
**Example:** !reset cheese
en.report:
**Command:** %p%report
**Description:** Report a malicious user to your local server staff.
**Usage:** %p%report [*user id* **OR** *user mention*] [*reason*]
**Example:** !report @serverowner For being too cool for server.
en.role:
**Command:** %p%role
**Description:** Add or remove a role to a specified user.
**Usage:** %p%role [*user*] [*role name*] 
**Example:** !role Gaius Cicerius Bot
en.roles:
**Command:** %p%roles
**Description:** Get a list of current defined custom roles for a server.
**Usage:** %p%roles 
**Example:** !roles
en.roleopt:
**Command:** %p%roleopt
**Description:** Changes the options of a role.
**Usage:** %p%roleopt [role name] %['[entire options set]' *or* 'add' *or* 'rem'] [*if add or rem* Option]
**Example:** !roleopt killer cheese %[unique, reset, perma, auto, vc]
WARNING: YOU NEED THAT %. If that percent is not there the bot will fail to grab the proper name of the role.
en.say:
**Command:** %p%say
**Description:** Make the bot say something in a chat.
**Usage:** %p%say [*optional channel*] text to say 
**Example:** !say Ooooo I'm self aware!
en.set:
**Command:** %p%set
**Description:** Set up local ideas/user reports, add ideas for ideas, reports for reports, and channel to set the channel. You can either provide 'off', 'on' or leave blank to toggle.
**Usage:** %p%set [*flag*] [**if channel** *channel mention*] 
**Example:** !set channel staff-only-shhh
en.setchannel:
**Command:** %p%setchannel
**Description:** Sets the channel to display welcome and leave messages.
**Usage:** %p%setchannel [channel name]
**Example:** !setchannel totes not staffchat
en.setcleaner:
**Command:** %p%setcleaner
**Description:** Set up the auto cleaner in the channel you designate with the time you designate.
**Usage:** %p%setcleaner **Mention** *hours* 
**Example:** !setcleaner #lobby-chat 2
en.setdelete:
**Command:** %p%setdelete
**Description:** Sets the delete timeout in seconds before welcome messages are auto deleted.
**Usage:** %p%setdelete [number]
**Example:** !setdelete 30
en.setdesc:
**Command:** %p%setdesc
**Description:** Sets a description to be displayed next to the roles when doing !roles.
**Usage:** %p%setdesc [name] %[description]
**Example:** !setdesc anonymous users %People who don't like names.
WARNING: YOU NEED THAT %. If that percent is not there the bot will fail to grab the proper name of the role.
en.setleave:
**Command:** %p%setleave
**Description:** Sets the leave message for when users leave.
**Usage:** %p%setleave [*current*/*disable* **or** *new*] [*if 'new'* leave message]
**Example:** !setleave new Bai bai *jackass*
en.setstaff:
**Command:** %p%setstaff
**Description:** Changes the staff chat to be used by the bot.
**Usage:** %p%setstaff [name]
**Example:** !setstaff not staffchat
en.settype:
**Command:** %p%settype
**Description:** Sets the type of welcome and leave message to display.
**Usage:** %p%settype [*optional* leave **or** welcome] [*embed*, *text* **or** *dm*]
**Example:** !settype leave embed
en.setwelcome:
**Command:** %p%setwelcome
**Description:** Sets the welcome message for new users.
**Usage:** %p%setwelcome [*current* **or** *new*] [*if 'new'* welcome message]
**Example:** !setwelcome new Hello %user% welcome to our %guild%, dont spam.
en.slowmode:
**Command:** %p%slowmode
**Description:** Turns on slowmode. Slowmode limits users to sending a message to the time that is dictated. Can be set to channel or guild. To turn off simply do !slowmode -1 or !slowmode off
**Usage:** %p%slowmode [# for channel ***or*** server] [*if server* #] 
**Example:** !slowmode server 9001
en.softban:
**Command:** %p%softban
**Description:** Softbans a person. This is like unto a kick, but removes the last 24 hours of messages.
**Usage:** %p%softban [mention] [*optional* reason]
**Example:** !softban @buckshot because i wanted to
en.suggest:
**Command:** %p%suggest
**Description:** Suggest an idea for this server!
**Usage:** %p%suggest *suggestion here* 
**Example:** !suggest Better admins and mods!
en.survey:
**Command:** %p%survey
**Description:** Create a survey using the bot, warning the setup is long and timed, please have your answers ready.
**Usage:** %p%survey 
**Example:** !survey
en.switchm:
**Command:** %p%switchm
**Description:** Switches mutes in between role and overwrites, takes no variables.
**Usage:** %p%switchm 
**Example:** !switchm
en.tempban:
**Command:** %p%tempban
**Description:** Bans a person from a guild for a set time (in days), deletes the previous 24 hours of messages.
**Usage:** %p%tempban [mention] [time in days] [*optional* reason]
**Example:** !tempban @pizza 2 too much pizza meme
en.toggle:
**Command:** %p%toggle
**Description:** Toggles the logging of the bot and what is logged.
**Usage:** %p%toggle [*log* **or** *type*]
**Example:** !toggle warns
Types include: bans, warns, kicks, mutes, images, spamming, and filters.
en.unalias:
**Command:** %p%unalias
**Description:** Remove an alias from a command, simply put the alias you wish to stop using.
**Usage:** %p%unalias [*alias*] 
**Example:** !unalias neko
en.unban:
**Command:** %p%unban
**Description:** Unbans a person from the guild, use id or name.
**Usage:** %p%unban [username *or* id]
**Example:** !unban trollperson
en.unbanword:
**Command:** %p%unbanword
**Description:** Unbans a word from the chat, removing it from the local filter.
**Usage:** %p%unbanword [text]
**Example:** !unbanword >:(
en.unlearn:
**Command:** %p%unlearn
**Description:** Deletes a custom command from the bot.
**Usage:** %p%unlearn [command name]
**Example:** !unlearn restraint
en.unmerge:
**Command:** %p%unmerge
**Description:** Un-merge a curated list with your local banned words list, removing any words that are in both.
**Usage:** %p%unmerge [filter name] 
**Example:** !unmerge swears
en.user:
**Command:** %p%user
**Description:** Gets information about a user inside a guild.
**Usage:** %p%user [*mention* **or** *id*]
**Example:** !user 198536269586890752
en.vcmute:
**Command:** %p%vcmute
**Description:** Server mute a user, this will add the 'server muted' check and not allow them to speak in voice channels.
**Usage:** %p%vcmute *user mention* [**optional** *time in minutes*] 
**Example:** !vcmute @user 30
en.vcunmute:
**Command:** %p%vcunmute
**Description:** Unmute someone for voice chat.
**Usage:** %p%vcunmute *user mention*
**Example:** !vcunmute @muteduser
en.verify:
**Command:** %p%verify
**Description:** Setups role verification for the server. These are usually roles users get with !role to verify they've read the rules.
**Usage:** %p%verify
**Example:** !verify
en.volunteer:
**Command:** %p%volunteer
**Description:** Volunteer to recieve notifications of errors from the bot.
**Usage:** %p%volunteer 
**Example:** !volunteer
en.warn:
**Command:** %p%warn
**Description:** Warn a user for whatever reason.
**Usage:** %p%warn [mention] [*optional* reason]
**Example:** !warn @gaius for being t00 c00l
en.warnlist:
**Command:** %p%warnlist
**Description:** Gets a list of warnings registered to a person on a server.
**Usage:** %p%warnlist [mention *or* ID]
**Example:** !warnlist @ownerperson
en.whitelist:
**Command:** %p%whitelist
**Description:** Adds an invite or url to the whitelist.
**Usage:** %p%whitelist [invite **or** url]
**Example:** !whitelist http://discord.gg/C7SxkVh
en.wipe:
**Command:** %p%wipe
**Description:** WARNING: This command is used to wipe data that the bot has stored about your guild. Settings and options will be wiped. Optionally you can specify to wipe only those instead of all data.
**Usage:** %p%wipe *optional* setting 
**Example:** !wipe setting

en.addrole:
Created new custom role: {rn}
Any user may now add this role by doing **{gp}{rn}**
help:
Commands: 
Staff Commands: 

Do {gp}help *staff* to get my chat moderation commands

sp.addrole:
Creado nuevo rol personalizado: {rn}
Cualquier usuario ahora puede añadir este rol haciendo **{gp}{rn}**
help:
Comandos: 
Comandos de staff: 

Usa: {gp}help *staff* para obtener mis comandos de moderación de chat
sp.inviteme: Este es mi enlace de invitación:
stats:
%b% : Código:
%T% : PR / Diseño de web
%s% : Documentación
